title: Tommy Hilfiger Men's 1790874 Gold-Tone Watch with Brown Leather Band
feature: Watch featuring round dial with logo at 12 o'clock, black Arabic hour markers, and trio of subdials
Gold-tone 44 mm case and mineral dial window
Leather croco-embossed calfskin band with buckle closure

Only purchases from an authorized retailer of Tommy Hilfiger Watches are covered by the manufacturer’s warranty. Amazon is currently the only authorized dealer of Tommy Hilfiger Watches on the Amazon.com site.
description: Gold-plated stainless steel case with a brown embossed leather strap. Fixed gold-plated stainless steel bezel. Silver dial with gold-tone hands and Arabic numeral hour markers. Minute markers around the outer rim. Dial Type: Analog. Three multi-function sub-dials displaying: 24 hour, date and day of the week. Quartz movement. Scratch resistant sapphire crystal. Pull / push crown. Solid case back. Case diameter: 44 mm. Case thickness: 12.5 mm. Round case shape. Band width: 21 mm. Tang clasp. Water resistant at 50 meters / 165 feet. Functions: date, day, GMT, second time zone, hour, minute, second. Casual watch style. Tommy Hilfiger GMT Gold-plated Stainless Steel Mens Watch 1790874.
